title: The chemical society and its discontents: Ozone layer edition
content: The solutions to our problems so often simply create more and different problems.
creator: Kurt Cobb
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The Misunderstood History of CO2: The Science Behind Earth’s Most Controversial Molecule
content: In this episode, Nate is joined by science journalist Peter Brannen, who reframes CO2 from an industrial pollutant to a miraculous substance whose critical role within the carbon cycle makes Earth habitable.
creator: Nate Hagens
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Healing the Earth, One Community at a Time: Highlighting  ERC’s Global Impact
content: Eight years ago, the Ecosystem Restoration Communities (ERC) movement began with a simple but powerful belief: that everyday people everywhere could restore the land beneath their feet and, in doing so, restore hope for our shared future.
creator: Ecosystem Restoration Communities Staff
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Humanity Is Not the Problem!
content: True climate action doesn’t require vast data centers, billions of liters of water, or mineral-intensive hardware. It requires shorter distances, stronger communities, healthy soils, local food webs, and diverse, place-based economies that reduce demand at the source.
creator: Helena Norberg-Hodge
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Why Scientists Are Still Puzzled by Consciousness
content: Despite several theories proposed by scientists and philosophers, there are no conclusive answers.
creator: Leslie Alan Horvitz
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The Commons in Practice: Case Studies From Around the World
content: From alpine pastures and salmon fisheries to offshore wind farms and online encyclopedias, commons take many forms. This article explores a wide range of real-world commons that span geographies, culture, and domains.
creator: Michel Rauchs
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Restoring Water to Arid Lands: Rethinking Dams and Soil in the MENA and Global South
content: Why water scarcity is not a climatic inevitability, and how nature-based solutions can rebuild life in landscapes under stress.
creator: El Habib Ben Amara
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: We Don’t Need Any More Renewables
content: The claim is ubiquitous: if we’re to meet our climate goals, we need a mass buildout of renewable energy production. But this claim is false, and worse yet, attempting it will accelerate climate collapse.
creator: The Last Farm
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: What’s with this cold?
content: These temperatures used to be normal. This winter is similar to an average winter in the 1980s, but the reason for this once-average cold is entirely new — and, paradoxically, it is completely because of global warming,
creator: Eliza Daley
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: Plastic Fantastic (documentary review)
content: This is a timely, informative, often unsettling documentary, one whose power comes from juxtaposition rather than argument. It refuses easy villains or fixes and challenges viewers to think less about individual consumption and more about systems of responsibility.
creator: Frank Kaminski
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: On A Lark
content: What I want to do in this post, just for fun (well, more than that), is use the rules of this game to show how hard it is to make a strong and clear case for a point that would still be tough to make if I could use all words. I think/hope we can learn from it.
creator: Tom Murphy
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.

title: The free market adorns a hierarchical and unjust system
content: This would not be the first time a system has an ideology or an official cause for existence that is contrary to the actual workings of the system. That has rather been the rule during most of human history.
creator: Gunnar Rundgren
sourceDescription: Insight and inspiration in turbulent times.
